com.day.cq.xss.taglib

Class InvalidatePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • TagSupport
      • com.day.cq.xss.taglib.InvalidatePolicy
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class InvalidatePolicy
extends TagSupport
    This class provides a tag that can be used to invalidate a cached policy.
